text: kavurun visvasaya taba dæhæmi kriyavan karannoda, ovunva niyata vasayenma allah svargayanhi ætulu karanneya. evayehi diya dahara sadakal galaminma ætteya. (nævatat) ran valaluda, mutu valin nimavu abharanada (tyaga vasayen) ovunta anndavanu læbe. ovunge ændum nam, (sumudu) pata selavalin nimavu eva vanneya
